import React, { useState } from "react"; import DrawerCart from "../drawerCart"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setOpenMenu] = useState(false); const [isBasketOpen, setOpenBasket] = useState(false); const [isLikeOpen, setOpenLike] = useState(false); const [numbeInput, setNumInput] = useState(""); const [formanInput, setFormatInput] = useState(""); const country = "+380"; const formatPhoneInput = (number: string, country: string) => { // Remove non-numeric characters from the input const numericValue = number.replace(/\D/g, ""); // Add the country code to the number const formText = `${country} ${numericValue}`; // Remove duplicate country codes const cleanedText = formText.replace(/(\+380\s*)+/g, "+380 "); // Format the phone number const formattedPhoneNumber = cleanedText.replace( /^(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{3})$/, "+$1 $2-$3-$4-$5" ); // Update the state with the formatted phone number setFormatInput(formattedPhoneNumber); }; isBasketOpen || isMenuOpen || isLikeOpen ? (document.body.style.overflow = "hidden") : (document.body.style.overflow = "auto"); const closeMenu = ( event: React.MouseEvent ): void => { if (event.currentTarget.classList[0] === "header__menu") { setOpenMenu(false); } else { console.log("No"); } }; return ( <>
